title: Chamizal National Memorial: Bookstore
body: Park Store       You can purchase gifts, books and collectibles at the Chamizal National Memorial park store. The store is operated in cooperation with Western National Parks Association, a nonprofit education partner of the National Park Service. Every purchase you make directly benefits Chamizal - a portion of every sale supports the memorial's educational and interpretive programs.  Western National Parks Association (WNPA) members receive exclusive benefits including discounts on most items in WNPA stores online and across many western states. Some national park stores run by other cooperating associations will also give discounts to WNPA members. To find out more, become a member or browse the online store, visit www.wnpa.org.
